product_description: Fancy water bottle with beautiful design for kids in blue body and pink cap. leak proof with vibrant body design.

copy_data.primary_copy: Keep your little one hydrated in style! Stunning blue & pink bottle with playful designs they'll love to show off 💧✨
copy_data.headline: Make Hydration Fun & Fashionable
copy_data.description: Leak-proof perfection meets vibrant design in this kid-friendly water bottle. Safe, stylish, and guaranteed to make water breaks more exciting.

claude_optimized_prompt: A modern water bottle for kids placed on a sunny kitchen counter, soft morning light streaming in, blue body with pink cap and playful geometric patterns, next to fresh fruit and a backpack. Professional product photography style, shallow depth of field, rule of thirds composition, bright airy aesthetic, lifestyle context

image_generation_result.revised_prompt: A professional product photography of a modern water bottle for kids placed on a sunny kitchen counter. The water bottle has a blue body with a pink cap and playful geometric patterns. Soft morning sunlight streams in through the window, creating a bright and airy aesthetic. The background features fresh fruit and a colorful backpack to provide a lifestyle context. The image has a shallow depth of field, adhering to the rule of thirds composition. The overall scene feels vibrant and clean, with a warm and inviting atmosphere ideal for showcasing the product.
